t: What Is Amazon Family? - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon Family allows you to easily manage all your shared services, subscriptions, and digital content from one place. You can manage profiles or linked accounts to share benefits and control access to services and content for kids and teens. Amazon Family allows you to share Amazon benefits ...

t: Amazon offers backup family care to 650,000+ U.S. employees
s: August 21, 2020 - Company adds new benefit to support full and part-time permanent Amazon and Whole Foods Market employees, offering 10 days of subsidized child or adult care into early 2021.

t: Add an Adult to an Amazon Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: To add an adult to your Amazon Family, you can either send an email invitation or sign up together.

t: Create Your Amazon Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: Note: Your Amazon Family invitees must live in the same country or region as you.

t: Amazon brings Amazon Clinic, One Medical under a single brand

t: Amazon FamilyFlex helps bring more parents back to the workplace
s: Amazon FamilyFlex provides new and existing hourly employees flexible work options, comprehensive benefits, additional care options, and financial resources for their families.
